item.title: Trying to make NPC's talk out loud
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Grats

if (npcs[i].npcType == 659) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "De dust89 is the man yo!"; } return true; }

item.title: Trying to make NPC's talk out loud
item.dc:creator: @dragon39990 dragon39990
item.description:
@dragon39990 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 659) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "test"; } return true;
Change that to

if (npcs[i].npcType == 659) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "test"; } } return true;

I believe the problem was that you just forgot a “}”

item.title: Trying to make NPC's talk out loud
item.dc:creator: @n10si_t n10si t
item.description:
@n10si_t wrote:

Title.

I have this in NPCHandler:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 659) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "test"; } return true;

But when I compile, I get this:

NPCHandler.java:3502: class, interface, or enum expected if (npcs[i].npcType == 659) { ^ NPCHandler.java:3505: class, interface, or enum expected npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; ^ NPCHandler.java:3506: class, interface, or enum expected npcs[i].textUpdate = "test"; ^ NPCHandler.java:3507: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 4 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

Please help!

Read full topic
